<?php
 namespace blobfolio\wp\wh\vendor\phone\data; class dataBG extends data { const CODE = 'BG'; const PREFIX = 359; const REGION = 'Europe'; const PATTERNS = array( '[2-7]\d{6,7}|[89]\d{6,8}|2\d{5}', ); const TYPES = array( '2\d{5,7}|(?:43[1-6]|70[1-9])\d{4,5}|(?:[36]\d|4[124-7]|[57][1-9]|8[1-6]|9[1-7])\d{5,6}'=>array( 'fixed', ), '43[07-9]\d{5}|(?:48|8[7-9]\d|9(?:8\d|9[69]))\d{6}'=>array( 'mobile', ), '800\d{5}'=>array( 'toll_free', ), '90\d{6}'=>array( 'premium_rate', ), '700\d{5}'=>array( 'shared_cost', ), ); const FORMATS = array( '(\d{6})'=>'$1', '(\d)(\d)(\d{2})(\d{2})'=>'$1 $2 $3 $4', '(\d{3})(\d{4})'=>'$1 $2', '(\d)(\d{3})(\d{3,4})'=>'$1 $2 $3', '(\d{2})(\d{3})(\d{2,3})'=>'$1 $2 $3', '(\d{3})(\d{2})(\d{3})'=>'$1 $2 $3', '(\d{3})(\d{3})(\d{2})'=>'$1 $2 $3', '(\d{2})(\d{3})(\d{3,4})'=>'$1 $2 $3', '(\d{3})(\d{3})(\d{3})'=>'$1 $2 $3', ); }
